attributes.action: sanction drs that mistreat patients with b12 deficiency
attributes.additional_details: People are losing their health , jobs , lives , because drs fail to test for , recognise , and adequately treat vitamin b12 deficiency.This is a cheap water soluble vitamin , with no upper level set for safety / toxicity.It costs the uk thousands of pounds more per patient not to diagnose and treat this illness with as much b12 as the individual patient needs .And renders many too disabled to work .Drs , often refuse to treat patients according to nhs guidelines , these drs should be sanctioned .
